{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_M_FireShotgun}} '''A_M_FireShotgun'''
(no parameters)
Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. Otherwise, plays the sound "weapons/shotgf" on the WEAPON channel, calls [[A_FaceTarget]], then performs seven missile-range hitscan attack with a horizontal spread of 5.625Â°, each of them inflicting 5d3 damage and spawning a {{Class|BulletPuff}}. This replicates {{Class|Shotgun}} [[A_FireShotgun|fire]]. Finally, it sets the calling actor's special1 field to the current tic count + 27. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} and derived classes. {{DEFAULTSORT:M_FireShotgun1}}[[Category:Decorate Doom functions]] [[Category:Decorate Classic attack functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
